00031 #include <stdio.h>
00032 #include <stdlib.h>
00033 #include <stdarg.h>
00034 #include "midas.h"
00035 #include "mcstd.h"
00036 
00037 /*---- globals -----------------------------------------------------*/
00038 
00039 #define MAX_DEVICES 10
00040 
00041 static INT camac_crate[MAX_DEVICES];
00042 static INT camac_slot[MAX_DEVICES];
00043 static float config[MAX_DEVICES];
00044 
00045 /*---- device driver routines --------------------------------------*/
00046 
00047 INT lrs2415_init(HNDLE hKey, INT index, INT channels)
00048 {
00049    int size;
00050    HNDLE hDB;
00051 
00052    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00053 
00054    /* read LRS2415 settings */
00055    camac_crate[index] = 0;
00056    size = sizeof(INT);
00057    db_get_value(hDB, hKey, "CAMAC crate", &camac_crate[index], &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00058 
00059    camac_slot[index] = 1;
00060    size = sizeof(INT);
00061    db_get_value(hDB, hKey, "CAMAC slot", &camac_slot[index], &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00062 
00063    config[index] = (float) 3.5;
00064    size = sizeof(float);
00065    db_get_value(hDB, hKey, "Configuration", &config[index], &size, TID_FLOAT, TRUE);
00066 
00067    return FE_SUCCESS;
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00071 
00072 INT lrs2415_exit(INT index)
00073 {
00074    return FE_SUCCESS;
00075 }
00076 
00077 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00078 
00079 INT lrs2415_set(INT index, INT channel, float value)
00080 {
00081    if (config[index] == 3.5)
00082       value *= 4;
00083    else
00084       value *= 2;
00085 
00086    camo(camac_crate[index], camac_slot[index], 0, 16, (WORD) value);
00087 
00088    return FE_SUCCESS;
00089 }
00090 
00091 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00092 
00093 INT lrs2415_get(INT index, INT channel, float *pvalue)
00094 {
00095    INT q, x, d;
00096 
00097    /* trigger voltage conversion */
00098    camc(camac_crate[index], camac_slot[index], 0, 26);
00099 
00100    do {
00101       cam16i_q(camac_crate[index], camac_slot[index], 0, 0, (WORD *) & d, &x, &q);
00102    } while (x && !q);
00103 
00104    if (config[index] == 3.5)
00105       *pvalue = (float) d;
00106    else
00107       *pvalue = (float) d *2;
00108 
00109    return FE_SUCCESS;
00110 }
00111 
00112 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00113 
00114 INT lrs2415_get_current(INT index, INT channel, float *pvalue)
00115 {
00116    INT q, x, d;
00117 
00118    /* trigger current conversion */
00119    camc(camac_crate[index], camac_slot[index], 1, 26);
00120 
00121    do {
00122       cam16i_q(camac_crate[index], camac_slot[index], 0, 0, (WORD *) & d, &x, &q);
00123    } while (x && !q);
00124 
00125    if (config[index] == 3.5)
00126       *pvalue = (float) (d * 0.625);
00127    else
00128       *pvalue = (float) (d * 0.250);
00129 
00130    return FE_SUCCESS;
00131 }
00132 
00133 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00134 
00135 INT lrs2415_set_current_limit(INT index, INT channel, float value)
00136 {
00137    if (config[index] == 3.5)
00138       value /= 10;
00139    else
00140       value /= 4;
00141 
00142    camo(camac_crate[index], camac_slot[index], 1, 16, (WORD) value);
00143 
00144    return FE_SUCCESS;
00145 }
00146 
00147 /*---- device driver entry point -----------------------------------*/
00148 
00149 INT lrs2415(INT cmd, ...)
00150 {
00151    va_list argptr;
00152    HNDLE hKey;
00153    INT index, channel, status;
00154    float value, *pvalue;
00155 
00156    va_start(argptr, cmd);
00157    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00158 
00159    switch (cmd) {
00160    case CMD_INIT:
00161       hKey = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
00162       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00163       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00164       status = lrs2415_init(hKey, index, channel);
00165       break;
00166 
00167    case CMD_EXIT:
00168       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00169       status = lrs2415_exit(index);
00170       break;
00171 
00172    case CMD_SET:
00173    case CMD_SET_ALL:
00174       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00175       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00176       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00177       status = lrs2415_set(index, channel, value);
00178       break;
00179 
00180    case CMD_GET:
00181    case CMD_GET_ALL:
00182       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00183       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00184       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00185       status = lrs2415_get(index, channel, pvalue);
00186       break;
00187 
00188    case CMD_GET_CURRENT:
00189       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00190       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00191       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00192       status = lrs2415_get_current(index, channel, pvalue);
00193       break;
00194 
00195    case CMD_SET_CURRENT_LIMIT:
00196       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00197       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00198       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00199       status = lrs2415_set_current_limit(index, channel, value);
00200       break;
00201 
00202    default:
00203       break;
00204    }
00205 
00206    va_end(argptr);
00207 
00208    return status;
00209 }
